content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.5, y=-50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- None (the agent has harvested iron ore from this position but no structures were built here)

### Furnace group at positions (x=0.0, y=0.0) and (x=2.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x=0.0, y=0.0) with coal as fuel and currently processing iron ore.
- Furnace (position x=2.0, y=0.0) with coal as fuel and currently processing iron ore.

### Chest at position (x=8.5, y=0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position x=8.5, y=0.5) with an empty inventory.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces. In this case, the agent repeatedly attempted to insert iron ore without having any in inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
